pages.text: Water is used for many things, a reagent, solvent or simply for medium of heat transfer. The only way to get water in the process system is with the water extractor.$(br2)When placed in an infinite water source (must be submerged and at least 2 source blocks next to it), pumps can be used to extract water fom the pipe connection at the top.
The water will be atmospheric temperature of 25Â°C, there is no limit to how many pumps can extract from one extractor.
